products.title: Perforated Grey Aluminium Perfect Fit
products.description: Perforated slats on aluminium perfect fit blinds shield your room from the full glare of the sun, whilst still allowing you to see out. Designed for high-sunlight rooms such as conservatories, they're a hardwearing blind that provides gentle sun filtering, even when closed struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Battleship Grey Satin Perfect Fit
products.description: You want a black blind, your partner wants white; compromise with this relationship-preserving battleship grey satin style. Organic grey with a mid-gloss sheen, it's an elegant neutral that pairs well with monochrome blinds. As their most hard wearing style, aluminium blinds are ideal for humid and high-traffic spaces struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Grey Gloss Perfect Fit
products.description: The shimmering sheen of this grey gloss perfect fit offers a touch of glam to an otherwise neutral hue. Pair with monochromes or pastels for a harmonised interior. Aluminium blinds are their most hard wearing style, while the perfect fit clip-on system installs in 15 minutes, no tools required struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Cool Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: With kalmar cool grey (deluxe) you'll be able to create a homely interior that is on-trend and right up to date with the latest colour trends. The off-white detailing of the grain is a great way to lighten the mood and take the edge off the dominant background colour. Turning the guest bedroom into the homely space that your friends and family will never want to leave is all about finding the right balance.

products.title: Luster, Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of luster grey is the way in which it breaks up the traditional single colour fabrics with dashes of white. It gives the whole blind a larger than life quality that lets the light flow around your room without saturating the existing colours. Introducing other finely detailed finishes would be an inspired choice if you want to continue the theme around the room. Look to the natural world for inspiration by focusing on the huge variety of wood grains that you can introduce with your furniture and flooring.

products.title: Fagel Charcoal Roman Blind
products.description: Their fagel range will add the cosy feel to your home. This range comes in many colours which would suit any room. Revamp your home with the soft fabric and lovely colour of the fagel charcoal roman blind. products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Marble Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: In a matt, chalky paint, the cotswold deluxe in marble grey displays a chic light grey tone on wide wooden slats that tilt with ease for versatile light and air control. Coordinating ladder tapes are an effective feature, providing a matching, coherent look for sleek designer vogue. Match the marble grey with a soft sky blue for a cool and contemporary look and a tranquil ambience in a baby's nursery.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Light Grey - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Magnum, Taupe - Day Night Blind
products.description: A gorgeous fusion of chocolate and cream threads, the magnum in taupe looks both natural and stylish. Of course, it's also amazingly practical, with versatile privacy and light control that can be easily adjusted to your will. Use the taupe in an all-white living room, where light and airiness are your top priorities. Fill the room with natural, naked woods, both light and medium, and organic fabrics such as hessian and wicker, finishing the room off with a woven jute rug.

products.title: Luna Softshade Slate Grey Day And Night Blind
products.description: This blind has a unique look that is sleek and stylish as well as highly practical for a modern living space. The luna softshade slate grey day and night roller blind can be easily adjusted to suit any time of day, the weather and your mood. It can be completely closed or open, or adjusted to the semi closed position with strips of voile between the solid slate grey fabric panels. This mode allows for an element of privacy with the benefit of natural light.

products.title: Luna Softshade Flint Grey Day And Night Blind
products.description: Enjoy a peaceful and uplifting ambience in your home with the luna softshade flint grey day and night roller blind. This blind features a design of alternating cool grey fabric and voile strips that looks ultra smart and contemporary and allows plenty of light to penetrate whilst maintaining a sense of privacy.
